document.full_text: heavily armed taliban fighters, appearing in a video purporting to show frontline militants in southern afghanistan, have said the killing of osama bin laden will inspire them to continue fighting until all foreign troops have left the country.
document.title: frontline taliban promise revenge attacks after bin laden
lines_and_colors: heavily armed taliban fighters, appearing in a video purporting to show frontline militants in southern afghanistan, have said the killing of osama bin laden will inspire them to continue fighting until all foreign troops have left the country.
